basics.name: Mani Sazvar
basics.label: Computer Engineer
basics.summary: An Iranian-born theoretical computer scientist. widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: Iran University of science and technology
work.summary: Teaching at AI and ML Laboratory

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded The title 'Man of the year'

education.institution: Iran University Of Science And Technology, Tehran, Iran

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Computer science (Turing Award)
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

publications.name: what we don't know about quantum computing
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the quantum information

publications.name: The Hacker Culture
publications.summary: In this paper, Mani Sazvar, A nobel laurete, emphasized the necessity to identify different aspects of Hacker culture
